original_text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee, he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers.
korean_text: 갈릴리 해변으로 지나가시다가 시몬과 그 형제 안드레가 바다에 그물 던지는 것을 보시니 그들은 어부라

sentences.original_text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee,
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그가 갈릴리 바다를 걸어갈 때,

sentences.original_text: he saw Simon and Andrew his brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 시몬과 그의 형제 안드레를 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: casting a net into the sea:
